# Inconsistent Nested Levels

> First level.
>> Second level.
> > Second level with extra space.
>
> Back to first level.

---

> First level.
> > Second level.
>> Second level without space.
>
> Back to first level.

---

 > First level.
> > Second level without space.
 > > Second level.
 >> Second level without space.
 >
> Back to first level.
